name: Grupo Bryndis
description: '''Grupo Bryndis''' is a Mexican [[Grupera|grupero]] band from [[Cerritos, San Luis Potos√≠]], In 1983 by Mauro Posadas, the band is a [[Latin Grammy Award]] winner. The band has performed [[Sentimental ballad|ballads]], [[cumbia]]s, [[ranchera]]s, and [[huapango]]s.
